remarks: Closure of a finite sum of complex numbers ` A ( k ) ` .  (Contributed by NM, 9-Nov-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Apr-2014.)
statement:
fsumcl.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fsumcl.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
fsumcl $p |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. A B e. CC ) $.
$d A k $.
$d k ph $.
